testcase.name: Normal item quality cannot go below 0
Aged Brie can start at quality 0
Aged Brie quality cannot exceed 50
Backstage pass quality cannot exceed 50
Sulfuras quality is always 80 (exception to 50 limit)
Backstage pass after concert drops to 0
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @1.1 Quality floor (minimum 0)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @1.2 Quality floor (minimum 0)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @1.3 Quality floor (minimum 0)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @1.4 Quality floor (minimum 0)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @1.5 Quality floor (minimum 0)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @2.1 Quality ceiling (maximum 50, except Sulfuras)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @2.2 Quality ceiling (maximum 50, except Sulfuras)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @2.3 Quality ceiling (maximum 50, except Sulfuras)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @2.4 Quality ceiling (maximum 50, except Sulfuras)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @2.5 Quality ceiling (maximum 50, except Sulfuras)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @2.6 Quality ceiling (maximum 50, except Sulfuras)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @2.7 Quality ceiling (maximum 50, except Sulfuras)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @3.1 Sulfuras exception (always 80)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @3.2 Sulfuras exception (always 80)
Quality boundaries are enforced for all item types -- @3.3 Sulfuras exception (always 80)
